electricityContract.terms: The sale of electricity to the Customer is subject to Next Business Energy's Market Terms and Conditions, which are available on its website at www.nextbusinessenergy.com.au.

discounts.description: This offer includes a guaranteed 8% discount on the market rates and charges detailed below (excluding demand charges, metering charges and other market pass-through charges). This discount will be shown as a separate item on your bill.

electricityContract.variation: Next Business Energy may vary the rates at any time in accordance with our terms and conditions.

demandCharges.description: Demand Charge  All kVA (c/kVA Daily). Uses the maximum kVA consumption from the meter readings within the period Mon - Fri, 16:00 - 21:00.

solarFeedInTariff.description: QLD - Solar Bonus Scheme | All kWh/day

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: This contract continues for as long as you choose to remain on the plan.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Additional service order and ancillary service fees may apply. For more information, please visit our  website at www.nextbusinessenergy.com.au.
